title: Tomorrow's Land Base
description: As a new version of Tomorrow's Land, this is where you can become a Creator ‚Äî designing your own Maps for the game's special built-in Gameplay modes and upload them to the server to share with everyone. Most importantly, you'll receive 50% of the revenue from in-game purchases.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Welcome to... Tomorrow's Land!
<!--text-->
A place where you can freely create your own Map using Cube blocks ‚Äî the only limit is your imagination. You can also share your Map to the server so everyone can experience it. Even better, I will share 50% of the revenue from in-game purchases with map creators.

When you upload your map to the server, it will default as an Offline Map. Every month, we‚Äôll select the top 100 maps with the most Likes and unlock Online features for them.

The game offers multiple Gameplay Modes so everyone can find their favorite style ‚Äî including Pirate, Survival (humorous version), Ship Battle, and more. In future updates, I plan to add Happy Farm gameplay and many other exciting modes based on community requests.

Gameplay ‚Äì Pirate ‚Äì (Online || Offline)
Classic keyboard controls, like in the 1990s (e.g., ‚ÄúCombo Attack: X + X + X‚Äù).

Map includes 13 different islands created by the Editor.

Guilds are limited to 10 members. Players can make friends and join events together.

PvP battles allow winners to earn part of the defeated player‚Äôs Bounty.

Guild PvP is a ship battle:

Roles include Ship Captain, Gunners (long-range attack), Warriors (defend the ship), and Raiders (board enemy ships using cannons).

The guild that destroys the opponent‚Äôs ship wins a share of their assets.

Events:
PvP Arena Event: 1v1 battles. Up to 16 players per server can register. Held at:
12:00 AM, 4:00 AM, 8:00 AM, 12:00 PM, 4:00 PM, 8:00 PM

Treasure Hunt Event:
Treasure chests randomly appear on islands. Open them by completing mini-games like Sudoku (10 types total). Available to players across all servers. Held at:
1:05 AM, 5:05 AM, 9:05 AM, 1:05 PM, 5:05 PM, 9:05 PM

Boss Hunt Event:
Bosses appear at fixed locations on islands. Open to all servers. Held at:
2:05 AM, 6:05 AM, 10:05 AM, 2:05 PM, 6:05 PM, 10:05 PM

Sea Boss Hunt Event:
Sea bosses spawn at specific ocean coordinates. Only ship cannons can damage them (immune to player damage). But beware ‚Äî rival guilds can also attack! Held at:
2:05 AM, 6:05 AM, 10:05 AM, 2:05 PM, 6:05 PM, 10:05 PM

Every hour: Equipment Shop and Auction Shop will appear.

Features:
Daily Quests involving Chemistry and Math, as my dream is to create a game where players can both play and learn! üòä

Item trading between players (in-game items only).

Auction system where players can list items.

Rock-Paper-Scissors mini-game between players.

Equipment Enhancement System.

Top Bounty Ranking, reset monthly.

Pet system: players can catch and raise pets.

...and many more features yet to be revealed!

Gameplay ‚Äì Survial ‚Äì (Online || Offline)
Third-person view.

Map is an island created by the Creator, up to 1km in size.

Each point earned from defeating an enemy automatically upgrades your weapon by 1 level.

You can team up with your Crew to survive longer ‚Äî the longer you last, the bigger the reward.

Mix and match weapons: melee + ranged. Map creators can place Cannons and Teleport Portals, so secure a good position for hunting points.

Note: All player stats are equal.

Gameplay ‚Äì Ship Battle ‚Äì (Online || Offline)
Requirement: Must have a Crew.

Third-person view.

Map includes many small islands created with the Creator, up to 2km in size.

Team up with your Crew to set sail, capture treasures, and hunt sea monsters.

But be careful ‚Äî other Crews can sink your ship at any time!

Ship appearance and stats are carried over from the Pirate Gameplay.

Note: All player stats are equal.
